text: 14 March 2025 : Friday Mar 2025 : Friday See More Photos of:  Book In this video I discuss Dr. Michael Newton’s influential book “Journey of Souls,” which dives into the experiences of souls between lives through psychotherapy and hypnosis. I highlight how Newton’s methods show the interconnectedness of past lives and the lessons I’ve come to appreciate from the spirit world after death. I walk you through the stages souls go through post-death—like being welcomed into the spirit realm, reviewing life experiences, and even exploring alternate life paths. Ultimately, I share a vision of life beyond Earth that’s full of love, learning, and connection.
html:
14

March 2025 : Friday Mar 2025 : Friday

See More Photos of:  Book

In this video I discuss Dr. Michael Newton’s influential book “Journey of Souls,” which dives into the experiences of souls between lives through psychotherapy and hypnosis. I highlight how Newton’s methods show the interconnectedness of past lives and the lessons I’ve come to appreciate from the spirit world after death. I walk you through the stages souls go through post-death—like being welcomed into the spirit realm, reviewing life experiences, and even exploring alternate life paths. Ultimately, I share a vision of life beyond Earth that’s full of love, learning, and connection.
